body: So basically itâ€™s the chance that it rains on you specifically.
LOL, did you even preview this before sharing? No one is interested in this crap. Save your time and ours!
this is why i bring my umbrella 100% of the time i go out. i dont go out without my bag anyway ðŸ˜‚
Sharing online takes effort. Harsh comments like this go against the respect and support we should hold ourselves to here.
Critique is helpful, but insults are not. We all want this community to be safe and respectful, don't we?
This space is meant for sharing and learning, not tearing others down. Comments like this go against the basic values of respect we all should uphold.
Someone worked hard to share this, and comments like this can really make them feel small. Imagine how they're feeling right now. It's a tough thing to read.
Imagine if this was your post and someone dismissed it this way. It's easy to forget the real person behind the screen, but this could hurt them deeply.
Think about how you'd feel if your work was called 'crap.' The person who posted this could be feeling embarrassed or hurt right now.
